publishing_focus.primary_focus: First-hand accounts of war, military strategy, and the socio-political impact of war
publishing_focus.target_audience: War veterans, military history enthusiasts, students of social and political history
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Relies on personal accounts and primary resources to provide a unique, immersive and authentic perspective on war
publishing_focus.example_titles: Diaries from the trenches of WWI, analytical accounts of Cold War strategies
